scripts: create service user group-provisioner with path system/wintergw2025

set ACL for group-provisioner
  allow jcr:read,jcr:readAccessControl,jcr:modifyAccessControl,rep:userManagement,rep:write on /home/users
  allow jcr:read,jcr:readAccessControl,jcr:modifyAccessControl,rep:userManagement,rep:write on /home/groups
end
